author: Special Correspondent
text:
The fireworks unit employee, K. Marimuthu (47), who was injured in the Monday’s fire accident at Radhika Fireworks in Thyagarajapuram near here, died on Tuesday morning.

Police said that the victim, who suffered 90 per cent burns, succumbed to injuries at Sivakasi Government Hospital.

Vachchakarapatti police have already arrested two persons in connection with the accident.
title: Fireworks unit worker succumbs to burns
